style_syntax

Style Syntax Overview


style <TagName> { ... }


style xyz {
    enter/exit can be placed on any block
    
    targets are animation/sound/ maybe others? particles? log? emit event?

    enter play animation name;
    exit play animation name;
    verbs are play, pause, loop, stop, reset
}

mixin some-mixin(params) {
        
}

style withVariables {

    BackgroundColor = var(primary, red);

    [attr:whatever] {
        set primary = @constColor;
        set dots.are.valid = green;
    }
    
}
texturing --
    // gradients use only BackgroundImageScaleX but otherwise can accept texture transforms
    BackgroundImage = linear-gradient("gradientName");
    BackgroundImage = radial-gradient("gradientName");
    BackgroundImage = conic-gradient("gradientName");
    BackgroundImage = elliptical-gradient("gradientName");
    BackgroundImage = "texture name";
    
    Mask = "texture name";
    Mask = soft-mask("texture name");
    Mask = soft-mask-inverse("texture name");
    Mask = hard-mask("texture name");
    Mask = hard-mask-inverse("texture name");

    MaskThreshold = 0.5; // controls alpha levels to be masked

style xyz {

    [init] {
        // this is valid for exactly 1 frame and only when element is first enabled
        // useful for transitioning into place via reveals
        // ie PreferredSize = 0; w/ transition to actual size 
    }

   [focus:descendent] { }
   [focus:child] { }
   [focus:parent] { }
   [focus:ancestor] { }
   [when:condition] { }
   [unless:condition] { }
 
   [when:ancestor attr:key] {}  
   [when:ancestor attr:key = "SomeValue"] {}
   
   [when:parent attr:key] {}
   [when:parent attr:key = "SomeValue"] {}
   
   [when:tag(TagName)] 
   [when:tag(ModuleName::TagName)] 
     
   [when:root-tag(TagName)] 
   [when:root-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:parent-tag(TagName)]
   [when:parent-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
 
   [when:ancestor-tag(TagName)]
   [when:ancestor-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:child-with-tag(TagName)]
   [when:child-with-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:descendent-with-tag(TagName)]
   [when:descendent-with-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:first-with-tag(TagName)]
   [when:first-with-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:last-with-tag(TagName)]
   [when:last-with-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
   [when:only-with-tag(TagName)]
   [when:only-with-tag(ModuleName::TagName)]
   
}

// any property that is a string value in a style file is mapped to a value in the compilation with the same name 

animation pulse {
    
    Iterations = 2;
    Duration = 1000ms;
    Delay = 100ms;
    ForwardStartDelay = 0;
    ReverseStartDelay = 0;
    LoopType = PingPong | Constant;
    Direction = forward;
    Easing = bezier(0, 1, 1, 0) | Easing Enum  Value
    
    AssignProperties = BeforeStart | AfterCompleted | WhileRunning | WhileDelaying;

    0% {
        PreferredWidth = current;
    }
    50% {
        PreferredWidth = 1cnt;
    }
    75% {
        PreferredWidth = 0.5cnt;
    }
    100% {
        PreferredWidth = 2cnt;
    }
    
}

style style1 {
    transition spring(gentle) 200 = BackgroundColor, PreferredWidth;
    transition spring(wobbly) 200 = PreferredHeight;
    
    mixin (something-no-params);
    mixin (style2); // can also mixin styles but they can't take arguments in that case
    
    mixin (something-with-params) {
        color = orange;
    }
    
}

style style2 { .. }

mixin something-no-params() {
    BackgroundColor = red;
}

mixin something-with-params(%color = magenta) {
    BackgroundColor = %{color};
}

const s = 1, 2, 3, 4;
// delay is an optional final parameter for all elements
transition *easingfn* 1000ms 500ms? = PreferredWidth; 
transition QuarticEaseIn 1000ms 500ms = PreferredWidth;
transition spring(default | gentle | stiff | wobbly | slow | superslow) = PreferredWidth;
transition spring(@s) = PreferredWidth;
transition spring(120, 10) = PreferredWidth; // stiffness, damping
transition spring(120, 10, 1) = PreferredWidth; // stiffness, damping, mass
transition spring(120, 10, 2, 0.1) = PreferredWidth; // stiffness, damping, mass, precision
transition bezier(1, 2, 3, 4) duration delay = PreferredWidth;
